name: Looper Legacy
description:
It's a Figma plugin for creating trippy generated graphics. Works with any Vector, Shape or Text layer.


Looper Legacy is a fork of the original Looper plugin created by @kuldar with more features.


Usage


1. Select a layer to multiply

2. Set the iteration count

3. Set the incremental changes for

- position and rotation

- scaling change

- opacity

- fill color

- stroke width and color
